title: Tom Jones (singer)
summary: Sir Thomas John Woodward OBE (born 7 June 1940),[2] known professionally as Tom Jones, is a Welsh singer. His career began with a string of top-ten hits in the mid-1960s. He has toured regularly, with appearances in Las Vegas (1967â€“2011). Jones's voice has been described by AllMusic as a "full-throated, robust baritone".[3]
